resources.string: New Corsica welcomes you, traveler. \n\nI am Prefect Barnabas Severan. I must apologize for the state of our city but we live in troubled times.

string.comment: Ambrosius Nikoli Default Greet
string.speaker: Ambrosius Nikoli
string.name: AmbrosiusNikoli

resources.string: How is an honest, hardworking merchant to make a living under these wretched conditions? \n\nIt’s a disgrace to New Corsica and to our patrons.

string.comment: Ambrosius Nikoli Manticore Quest Intro
string.speaker: Ambrosius Nikoli
string.name: AmbrosiusNikoli

resources.string: Look at this wreckage! It’s a disgrace! Where are the blasted Praetorians? \n\nNew Corsica’s already battered reputation may not survive this latest calamity!

string.comment: Ambrosius Nikoli Final greet
string.speaker: Ambrosius Nikoli
string.name: AmbrosiusNikoli

resources.string: Well, I still insist that monster was a manticore! And you singlehandedly destroyed it! \n\nWhy, your legend will outshine even that of noble Evandrus!

string.comment: Pontifex Charmion Default Greet
string.speaker: Pontifex Charmion
string.name: Charmion

resources.string: The gods prepare to return, stranger! They judge our every deed, word, and thought! \n\nDo not anger them, lest you suffer their divine wrath!

string.comment: Pontifex Charmion Power of the Gods Intro
string.speaker: Pontifex Charmion
string.name: Charmion

resources.string: New Corsica has lost its way! We have displeased the gods and now evil sweeps over these lands led by a terrible demon!

string.comment: Pontifex Charmion Final Greet
string.speaker: Pontifex Charmion
string.name: Charmion

resources.string: If we do not prove ourselves worthy, the gods will never return! We must prepare the way! \n\nAn age of enlightenment awaits us!

string.comment: Pontifex Charmion Default Greet After Evandrus Awakened
string.speaker: Pontifex Charmion
string.name: Charmion

resources.string: What will become of us? Repent before it is too late! I pray the gods have mercy upon us all!

string.comment: Pontifex Charmion In Enemy Territory Intro
string.speaker: Pontifex Charmion
string.name: Charmion

resources.string: Be warned, New Corsica! The tyrant’s son has returned! \n\nWe must be vigilant! There is a venomous serpent in our midst!

string.comment: Pontifex Charmion Final Greet After Evandrus Quests
string.speaker: Pontifex Charmion
string.name: Charmion

resources.string: I must prepare the way… I do this for you, my beloved… enlightenment will come to the people…

string.comment: Akila Nuru Default Greet
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: Greetings, pilgrim. The gods once inhabited this holy site. Tread with reverence for they are watching.

string.comment: Akila Nuru The Sleeping Vessels Intro
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: The idols here were once vessels for the gods. The Pontifex believes that with the proper holy relic, we may call upon their power to aid us in our time of need.

string.comment: Akila Nuru Gems of the Immortals Intro
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string:
The relic’s dimensions must be precise. 

A hand in length, a palm in breadth, two digits in height… 

Yes, that’s correct!

string.comment: Akila Nuru Awakening Anubis Intro
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: There! The holy relic is done. It’s far more beautiful than I imagined. \n\nI put the hope of New Corsica in your hands, noble hero.

string.comment: Akila Nuru Insufficient Faith Intro
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: I have failed the people of New Corsica and exposed you to terrible danger. \n\nPlease forgive my unworthiness.

string.comment: Akila Nuru Final Greet
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: Please allow me time for quiet reflection. \n\nI must pray for forgiveness and seek to atone for my failure.

string.comment: Akila Nuru Ancient History Intro
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: One thing has become clear to me: The Pontifex has lost her reason. The long centuries have proven too much for her mind. \n\nFor her, immortality proved to be a curse.

string.comment: Akila Nuru The Prime Key Intro
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: Oh goodness, it seems the Pontifex once loved Crassus. She calls him by his first name, Lucius. \n\nShe’s even written romantic poetry about him…

string.comment: Akila Nuru The Forge of Ptah Intro
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: According to the Codex, the Prime Key can be reassembled in something called the Forge of Ptah. \n\nIt requires a special code to ignite it but I believe that code can be found near the forge itself.

string.comment: Akila Nuru A Date with Destiny Intro
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: With the Prime Key, I believe we now have hope of stopping Crassus and preventing another curse from being unleashed upon the land.

string.comment: Akila Nuru Sealing the Ennead Intro
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: There you are! I’ve finished translating the glyphs in the Forge of Ptah. \n\nI know the purpose of the Prime Key.

string.comment: Akila Nuru Final Greet
string.speaker: Akila Nuru
string.name: AkilaNuru

resources.string: The gods of this land bless you, noble hero. You are truly their chosen champion.

string.comment: Ariel Gideon Default Greet
string.speaker: Ariel Gideon
string.name: ArielGideon

resources.string: Be careful when traveling outside the city. An invasionary force gathers out there!

string.comment: Ariel Gideon Intro Quest Greet
string.speaker: Ariel Gideon
string.name: ArielGideon

resources.string: New Corsica is in desperate need of able-bodied heroes. \n\nThe Corrupted Legion will overrun this city unless we can find a way to stop them.

string.comment: Ariel Gideon Final Greet
string.speaker: Ariel Gideon
string.name: ArielGideon

resources.string: Your courage has given New Corsica a chance to resist Crassus. The people thank you!

string.comment: Alaina Kraus Default greet
string.speaker: Alaina Kraus
string.name: AlainaKraus

resources.string: You have entered a desperate battlefield, stranger! \n\nBe ready to defend yourself against the Corrupted!

string.comment: Alaina Kraus Tides of War Intro
string.speaker: Alaina Kraus
string.name: AlainaKraus

resources.string: Crassus has split his legion. He has taken the First Cohort to assault Akhet. \n\nI believe he intends to invade the sacred temple as he did centuries ago.

string.comment: Alaina Kraus The Hydra's Breath Intro
string.speaker: Alaina Kraus
string.name: AlainaKraus

resources.string: Your courage and skill are inspiring, but the sight of those siege engines darkens my hopes. \n\nThe 19th Legion is a formidable enough enemy without them.

string.comment: Alaina Kraus A Blaze of Glory Intro
string.speaker: Alaina Kraus
string.name: AlainaKraus

resources.string: Well done, noble hero! \n\nThis Hydra’s Breath will burn those blasted siege weapons to the ground!

string.comment: Alaina Kraus The Last True Centurion Intro
string.speaker: Alaina Kraus
string.name: AlainaKraus

resources.string: You must find the noble Evandrus Crassus! He may prove a great ally to our cause!

string.comment: Alaina Kraus Final Greet
string.speaker: Alaina Kraus
string.name: AlainaKraus

resources.string: Your deeds will never be forgotten! \n\nNew Corsica would be fortunate to have you as a citizen!

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus A Legend Restored Intro
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: You are not familiar to me. And I do not know a Tribune Kraus. \n\nWhere is everyone? What happened to the fort?

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus Final Greet After Being Awakened
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: So much has changed. How could I have been dreaming for so long? \n\nI must gather my wits about me…

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus Enemy Intelligence Intro
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: Prefect Drusilla commands these soldiers. She’s a bloodthirsty warmonger who serves only her own ambition. \n\nI always considered her a disgrace to the Legion. The Corruption must have found its way into the 19th through her.

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus Sabotage the Legion's Supplies Intro
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: Drusilla has a bodyguard named Magnus. He’s a giant of a Gaul who could kill most men with his bare hands. \n\nThe other centurions greatly fear and respect him. He is a symbol of Drusilla’s power.

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus The Hit List Intro
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: The success of your raids has left the camp in disarray! Drusilla will seek to close ranks with her tribunes. \n\nShe’s always so predictable.

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus Head of the Snake Intro
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: Drusilla must feel as if she’s stalked by Nemesis herself. \n\nI wouldn’t be surprised if the invasion of New Corsica was entirely her design.

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus Sic Transit Gloria Mundi Intro
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: I humbly beg your pardon. \n\nThis letter… comes as a terrible shock…

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus Default Greet in New Corsica
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: The defense of New Corsica continues. Steel yourself for the coming conflict.

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus Report to the Ancient Rise Intro
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: There you are, friend! I’ve spoken to Prefect Severan. He’s recalling the remaining Praetorians and securing the city. \n\nDid you speak to Charmion?

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus Default Greet After Nuru Quests
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: There are many evils that plague this land. Soon there will have to be a reckoning.

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus End Crassus's Threat Intro
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: I wanted to believe that the noble man who sacrificed so much, the loyal soul who loved friends and family, the champion who diligently protected the people of New Corsica, still existed. \n\nBut I must face the truth.

string.comment: Evandrus Crassus Final Greet
string.speaker: Evandrus Crassus
string.name: EvandrusCrassus

resources.string: Hail, hero of New Corsica! Your deeds shall endure as long as the stars!
The Legion's at our door, and the Ancients are rampaging across the sands. \n\nLet us drink and laugh while we can!
PLACEHOLDER
Welcome to the Thermae, my friend - the finest place to rest in all of Brimstone Sands!
PLACEHOLDER
This place holds many dangers for the unwary. \n\nMake sure your weapon is at the ready, and keep your wits about you.
There is never enough wine around when you need it. \n\nI am simply parched and could do with a cold drink.
Greetings, Seeker. I'm tracking the movements of the 19th Legion. \n\nMy task, I fear, will never be finished.
My farm was all but destroyed the last time I needed to travel to New Corsica. \n\nI swear, I never know what will happen next when I am away. But I must visit the city for supplies.
I hope you have paid your taxes recently! \n\nIf you have, you needn't worry about a visit from me, Caeso, Frumen of New Corsica!
